elements.name: question1
elements.title: Decide which of the following dismissals are abusive. Also discuss your solution with colleagues.
choices: Dismissal of the employee due to maternity (pregnancy)
Termination due to assertion of claims against the contractual partner
Termination by the employer due to unpunctuality
Termination due to trade union activity
Dismissal due to a personal characteristic of the employee (e.g. skin color, gender, etc.)
Dismissal due to artistic activity in leisure time
correctAnswer: Termination due to assertion of claims against the contractual partner
Termination due to trade union activity
Dismissal due to a personal characteristic of the employee (e.g. skin color, gender, etc.)
Dismissal of the employee due to maternity (pregnancy)
Dismissal due to artistic activity in leisure time
